name: suban-wildlife-website
description: Modern wildlife photography website for Suban Chaudhary

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm --workspace=client run build && npm --workspace=server run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --workspace=client install && npm --workspace=server install && npm --workspace=shared install
